{{flavour|A nasty poisonous liquid.}}
Quaffing a '''potion of poison''' will, unsurprisingly, [[poison]] your character for 1 to 5 levels (with a strong probability for 3). Your poison status will be set to yellow, or higher if you were already poisoned. Each level (up to poison level 5) will deal on average 8 damage, with a frequency depending on your number of poisoned levels (20% chance per turn per level to lose 1 HP).

They are not entirely useless, however. Characters with rPois may drink them for a small amount of [[nutrition]].

 "That liquid tasted very nasty..."
 "You feel slightly nauseous." (with poison resistance)

==History==
Potions of poison were removed in [[0.18]].

Prior to [[0.12]], potions of poison were useful when coupled with [[Evaporate]], producing [[cloud]]s of poison gas wherever they were thrown.
